bill_title: create a school holiday on the Tuesday after Labor Day.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to create a school holiday on the Tuesday after Labor Day. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 13-26 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: On the first Tuesday after the first Monday in September, no school may be in session, and no interscholastic activity may be conducted. For purposes of this section, an interscholastic activity is any activity that is sanctioned by the South Dakota High School Activities Association. Section 2. The effective date of this Act is July 1, 2007. 250 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.038 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
